title: Ticket #4982: condor_submit should have a command line arg to limit number of jobs
description: For dagman, and possibly for other uses. it should be possible to pass a command line argument to condor_submit that will set an upper limit on the number of jobs queued. If the limit is exceeded, then condor_submit should abort the submission and return an error.
remarks: abandoned. duplicate of #4981
